context: Forward-facing dash-cam view of a city street with two lanes in each direction and a pedestrian crosswalk ahead.
perception: The vehicle is stopped behind a large truck in the left lane and a Range Rover in the right lane. Both lanes are marked with yellow pedestrian crosswalk stripes. The traffic light ahead is green, indicating permission to proceed. Oncoming traffic includes a white truck and a white pickup truck in the opposite lanes. The street is lined with buildings on the left and trees on the right. The weather is clear with good visibility.
prediction: The vehicles ahead will start moving forward as the green light continues. Oncoming traffic will remain in their lanes. Pedestrians are not visible on the crosswalk at this moment.
planning: Maintain position behind the truck and Range Rover, prepare to accelerate smoothly once the vehicles ahead start moving, ensuring to yield to any pedestrians if they appear on the crosswalk.
